description: This Mercedes-Benz C180 W202 2014 W202 is a steal at just Rs.2500000. It has 194000km on the clock and comes with a Automatic transmission system as well as other great features. You will be hard pressed to find better value for your money elsewhere. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Mercedes-Benz C180 W202 2014
